songs.title: Piss
songs.lyrics:
(Piss... Piss)
Golden showers, water sports, you're drinking quarts of piss, you'll end up a stinking corpse fucked through the fist
(Piss...)
The K in wack, I'll get more in depth this concept was born from Marvin Gaye saying 'Piss on this track!'
(Piss...)
Europeons love drinkin piss, I'd love to serve some urine to the women in these clubs and make them think it's Cris
(Piss...)
You're actin all pissed, frontin' kid like you're mean, some of you rappers were pissin in bed til you were fourteen
(Piss...)
I take a piss to remove poison from inside of me, you drink piss because you are a poison to society
(Piss...)
You swallow and gargle cup-fulls like German cuckholds, that lick the sperm off knuckles. Three million Chinese
(Piss...)
Are drinkin urine like it's the norm, they think it's pure and form, comin from baby eaters, I'd be warned
(Piss...)
Japanese women bathing in urine goes on, as well as Indians drinking steaming hot piss since the birth of Kurong
(Piss...)
That shit is gay, it's not like water, piss goes down toilets, some boil it and then slurp it with a feces side order
(Piss...)
In a fuckin dungeon in Chelsea, you're as healthy as Willy Nelson's wealthy, I smell pee
(Piss...)
Wash your fuckin' pussy, go freshin up, cause this song was putrid enough, ICK!
(Piss...)
(Piss...)
(Piss...)
(Piss...)
(Piss...)
(Piss...)
(Piss...)
(Piss...)
